element_text:
{"chunk": "at cost. Subsequently, assets and liabilities are measured
as described below for each financial statement item.
Visse finansielle aktiver og forpligtelser måles til
amortiseret kostpris, hvorved der indregnes en konstant
effektiv rente over løbetiden. Amortiseret kostpris
opgøres som oprindelig kostpris med fradrag af afdrag og", "context": "The chunk describes the measurement of certain financial assets and liabilities at amortized cost, which involves recognizing a constant effective interest rate over the term. This is part of the company's summary of significant accounting policies."}
